author: veithen
msg: Mail transport: instead of requerying the transport.mail.ReplyAddress parameter from the service, use the replyAddress property from the PollTableEntry (as we do with the other parameters).

author: dblevins
msg: Use ant to workaround limitation in shade plugin.  It doesn't use the shaded jar in the build so we extract it into the target/classes directory as a workaround.

author: ieb
msg: Given an HTTP request to concat several resources, if one of those resources is not found, the request terminates at that resource instead of reporting an error and continuing.

author: midon
msg: Relax a constraint: a HTTP response header may be empty or missing even if a part is bound to it
